data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Ash Sharqiyah to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ash Sharqiyah, Egypt
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Ash Sharqiyah, Egypt today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Ash Sharqiyah, Egypt to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 227,277 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Moroccan, Arabic-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, defend your people in the state of Ash Sharqiyah against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Ash Sharqiyah, Egypt, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Ash Sharqiyah, Egypt.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.
